devices_included: Any screen device; Phone; Tablet; Laptop; Desktop computer
use_cases_desc: Multi-device keynote-like application. Used to guide through the use case to discuss interaction trajectories.
contribution_desc: Discuss using interaction trajectories to analyse multi-device applications.
crossdevice_def:
Mostly use multi-device applications terminology.
No clear definition. Describe 4 factors, though, that are relevant:
1 - the type, amount and structure of information,
2 - the representations of information,
3 - the devices, numbers and type
4- the users goals.
